snippet: Barneys’ holiday windows were unveiled on Thursday with ice dancers, step-troupers, opera singers, a cappella warblers and two break-dancing elves.
abstract: Barneys' holiday windows are unveiled, and after the ceremony a flock of the retailer's faithful adjourn to the Central Park Zoo for a dinner party designed by fashion auteur Baz Luhrmann.
lead_paragraph: Barneys’ holiday windows were unveiled on Thursday with ice dancers, step-troupers, opera singers, a cappella warblers and two break-dancing elves.

headline.main: Barneys’ Holiday Party Designed by Baz Luhrmann
headline.print_headline: Third Floor: Partridges in Pear Trees
